name: URL Record
author: Imanuel Novian (nick: noe, wp: noeprivacy)

sections.description: This plugin will create an URL Record on your blog and will write all activity on your blog in main blog page. The file report will found on /wp-content/url-record/data/ you can analize it for prevent your blog from hacker or attacker. This plugin is recomended for use if your hosting not use cpanel or etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload url-record.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. All record can be found on /wp-content/url-record/data/ directory
sections.faq: FAQ are not available for right now
sections.changelog:
1.0

Initial Version

1.1

Adding some new feature for easy manage your URL Record
